titles.title: A bill to delay the effective date of the proposed amendments to rule 11 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Delays the effective date of proposed amendments to rule 11 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure until December 1, 1994.
